page.title: 08Women's Institute.
page.content: The{Biggin W.I.}was{reformed in {1983/84.}We have a committee of 10 which includes a president,secretary and a treasurer. Committee meetings are held at one of the members homes on the 2nd Monday of each month,and {monthly meetings}are held in{Biggin {Village Hall every third Monday. Several items of business are dealt with at each meeting,but this is only a small part of the proceedings.The main item is the talk,film show or demonstration,which can cover any subject from "Corn Dollies" to "the History of Derbyshire".Many members take part in our monthly competition which is usually based on some craft, and during refreshment time the guest speaker will judge the items and give a small prize.
